snippet: With another Australian Open title having slipped through his fingers after a tournament plagued by off-court dramas, Andy Murray could not wait to see the back of Melbourne Park after losing his fifth final on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: With another Australian Open title having slipped through his fingers after a tournament plagued by off-court dramas, Andy Murray could not wait to see the back of Melbourne Park after losing his fifth final on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Beaten Murray in a Rush for the Exit Door
headline.main: Beaten Murray in a Rush for the Exit Door
